title: The Missing 2014 S01E07 HDTV x264 - GHOST DOG
description:
The Missing is a drama told through a delicate and complex narrative that reflect the frantic battle for a lost child. When five year-old Oliver disappears from his holiday in France, it causes a manhunt that will last for many years. The series will go inside the mind of the father, Tony, a man desperate to find his lost son. Tony's frantic and exhausting search breaks his marriage to Emily and begins to consume his life. Julien who was the detective who had launched the initial search for the child, also finds himself drawn back into the hunt, in a desperate attempt to resolve the mystery of Oliver's disappearance. The story will be two over two time frames and in two countries.

Episode 7 of 8 - Return to Eden:

In 2009, with no significant progress made in the case, Tony and Emily's marriage hangs by a thread - but a surprise turn of events brings them both back to Chalons du Bois for the first time since 2006.

In the present day, the information that Tony, Julien and Emily received gives them a tenuous lead. With Tony and Emily back in Chalons du Bois and finally making progress in the case, there is a thawing in their relationship.
